author: twgoetz

author: ltheussl
msg: [MPPDF-62] New property maven.pdf.generateTOC to specify the position of the Table of Contents.

author: bago
msg: Make sure runnable tests names ends with Test (otherwise they are ignored by ant).
Make sure non runnable (abstract) tests names starts with Abstract and are "public abstract" (otherwise they are launched from eclipse).
This ensure compatibility with our maven, ant and eclipse to run tests.

author: bibryam
msg: Added a service for canceling Item Issuances and Shipment plans when a sales shipment is cancelled. This should fix the bug described in OFBIZ-1766 "problem with creating a shipment after a canceled shipment on the Input status".
